    <link rel="stylesheet" href="http://f.fontdeck.com/s/css/OaP2JD6PVk/ahuPniZSG1Lenj1U/3/fontdeck.com/${fontSlug}/bolditalic.css" type="text/css" />
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="http://f.fontdeck.com/s/css/bkbh2qgJB8KnsZP6Upcw3s/ddtE/3/fontdeck.com/${fontSlug}/medium.css" type="text/css" />
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="http://f.fontdeck.com/s/css/htKMVugCuUHzkwFlDohmy5js+kE/3/fontdeck.com/${fontSlug}/light.css" type="text/css" />
    <style type="text/css">
        .s_lightitalic,
        .specimen h2 {
            font-family: "${fontName} Light Italic", courier;
            font-weight: 200;
            font-style: italic;
        }
        .s_extrabold,
        .specimen h2 {
            font-family: "${fontName} Extra Bold", courier;
            font-weight: bold;
            font-style: normal;
        }
        .s_italic,
        .specimen h2 {
            font-family: "${fontName} Italic", courier;
            font-weight: normal;
            font-style: italic;
        }
        .s_mediumitalic,
        .specimen h2 {
            font-family: "${fontName} Medium Italic", courier;
            font-weight: 600;
            font-style: italic;
        }
        .s_regular,
        .specimen h2 {
            font-family: "${fontName} Regular", courier;
            font-weight: normal;
            font-style: normal;
        }
        .s_extrabolditalic,
        .specimen h2 {
            font-family: "${fontName} Extra Bold Italic", courier;
            font-weight: bold;
            font-style: italic;
        }
        .s_medium,
        .specimen h2 {
            font-family: "${fontName} Medium", courier;
            font-weight: 600;
            font-style: normal;
        }
        .s_light,
        .specimen h2 {
            font-family: "${fontName} Light", courier;
            font-weight: 200;
            font-style: normal;
        }
        .s_extrafancy,
        .specimen h2 {
            font-family: "${fontName} Extra Fancy", courier;
            font-weight: 900;
            font-style: oblique;
        }
    </style>
</head>

                <div class="secondary">
                    <div class="message">
                        <h4>${fontName} web font family</h4>
                        <p class="sub">Fontdeck enables you to use ${fontName} as real text on your website, using CSS. Create an account with Fontdeck and try it for free!</p>
                        <p><a href="/register" class="button bigger no-margin">Create a free account</a></p>
                    </div>
                    <h3>About this font family</h3>
                    <table class="meta">
                        <tr>
                            <th>Classification</th>
                            <td>
                                <a href="/typefaces/nonlatin" class="classification nonlatin">Non-Latin</a> &raquo;
                                <a href="/typefaces/nonlatin/greek">Greek</a>
                                <br />
                                <a href="/typefaces/sansserif" class="classification sansserif">Sans Serif</a> &raquo;
                                <a href="/typefaces/sansserif/hybrid">Hybrid</a>
                                <br />
                                <a href="/typefaces/sansserif" class="classification sansserif">Sans Serif</a> &raquo;
                                <a href="/typefaces/sansserif/geometric">Geometric</a>
                            </td>
                        </tr>
                        <tr>
                            <th>Foundry</th>
                            <td><a href="/foundry/colophon">Reservoir Dogs</a></td>
                        </tr>
                        <tr>
                            <th>Designer</th>
                            <td>
                                <a href="/designer/eddharrington">Mr. Blonde</a>,
                                <a href="/designer/anthonysheret">Mr. Blue</a>
                            </td>
                        </tr>
                        <tr>
                            <th>Opentype</th>
                            <td>
                                <a href="/typefaces/all/tags/opentype:liga" rel="tag">liga</a>
                            </td>
                        </tr>
                        <tr>
                            <th>Superfamily</th>
                            <td>
                                <a href="/typefaces/all/tags/superfamily:${fontSlug}" rel="tag">${fontName}-super</a>
                            </td>
                        </tr>
                        <tr>
                            <th>Tags</th>
                            <td>
                                <ul class="tag-list">
                                    <li class="tag"><a href="/typefaces/all/tags/simple" rel="tag">simple</a></li>
                                    <li class="tag"><a href="/typefaces/all/tags/text" rel="tag">text</a></li>
                                    <li class="tag"><a href="/typefaces/all/tags/legible" rel="tag">legible</a></li>
                                    <li class="tag"><a href="/typefaces/all/tags/din" rel="tag">din</a></li>
                                    <li class="tag"><a href="/typefaces/all/tags/superfamily" rel="tag">super family</a></li>
                                    <li class="tag"><a href="/typefaces/all/tags/trueitalics" rel="tag">true italics</a></li>
                                    <li class="tag"><a href="/typefaces/all/tags/magazine" rel="tag">magazine</a></li>
                                    <li class="tag"><a href="/typefaces/all/tags/modern" rel="tag">modern</a></li>
                                    <li class="tag"><a href="/typefaces/all/tags/1930s" rel="tag">1930s</a></li>
                                    <li class="tag"><a href="/typefaces/all/tags/trendy" rel="tag">trendy</a></li>
                                    <li class="tag"><a href="/typefaces/all/tags/grotesque" rel="tag">grotesque</a></li>
                                    <li class="tag"><a href="/typefaces/all/tags/signage" rel="tag">signage</a></li>
                                    <li class="tag"><a href="/typefaces/all/tags/corporate" rel="tag">corporate</a></li>
                                    <li class="tag"><a href="/typefaces/all/tags/greek" rel="tag">greek</a></li>
                                    <li class="tag"><a href="/typefaces/all/tags/clean" rel="tag">clean</a></li>
                                </ul>
                            </td>
                        </tr>
                    </table>
                    <div class="sub">
                        <p>Leberkas drumstick t-bone chuck shank picanha, short loin spare ribs pastrami tri-tip pork chop pancetta beef corned beef rump. Biltong cow bacon chuck, t-bone beef tail pig beef ribs pork tongue pastrami frankfurter ham brisket. Kevin bresaola t-bone capicola. Chicken jowl kielbasa bacon shankle corned beef strip steak kevin.</p>
                        <p>Leberkas sirloin meatloaf biltong swine, pork pig shoulder landjaeger tail jowl picanha t-bone chuck. Chuck shoulder swine alcatra tri-tip meatball doner short loin fatback cow sirloin beef. Pastrami pork loin pancetta beef shank drumstick. Turkey shoulder venison chuck sirloin pork chop. Filet mignon t-bone pancetta pig jowl bacon.</p>
                        <p>Andouille kielbasa venison t-bone, bacon swine pork chop pancetta tongue. Pork belly shank pork chop, turducken corned beef ham pork loin spare ribs meatloaf. Flank cow brisket meatball turkey spare ribs. Doner tri-tip pork belly pork chop tongue picanha sirloin. Swine jerky kielbasa beef ribeye. Shankle jowl boudin bresaola swine drumstick.</p>
                    </div>
